note: To allow comparisons between countries and over time this metric is age-standardized.
title: Rate of disease burden from lead exposure
subtitle:
Disease burden is measured in disability-adjusted life years (DALYs). DALYs include the years of life lost due to premature death and years lived with a disability. One DALY equals one lost year of healthy life.
This is expressed as a rate per 100,000 people.
